Helix.text:
WHAT: Logistics robot 
CATEGORY: Robotics 
FEATURES: Handles diverse packages, human-level speed and high reliability, stateful perception, force sensing 
CAPABILITIES: Autonomous sorting, human handover behavior 
STAGE: Active development 
LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/scaling-helix-logistics 
NOTE: Continuously improving with new architectural refinements and data scaling
